channel.title: This American Life
channel.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast. It is hosted by Ira Glass, produced in collaboration with Chicago Public Media, delivered to stations by PRX The Public Radio Exchange, and has won all of the major broadcasting awards.
channel.itunes:author: This American Life
channel.itunes:subtitle: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast.

item.title: 513: 129 Cars
item.description: One car dealership tries to sell 129 cars. It is way more chaotic than we expected.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: One car dealership tries to sell 129 cars. It is way more chaotic than we expected.
item.itunes:summary: One car dealership tries to sell 129 cars. It is way more chaotic than we expected.

item.title: 206: Somewhere in the Arabian Sea
item.description: Life aboard an aircraft carrier stationed in the Arabian Sea supporting bombing missions over Afghanistan.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Life aboard an aircraft carrier stationed in the Arabian Sea supporting bombing missions over Afghanistan.
item.itunes:summary: Life aboard an aircraft carrier stationed in the Arabian Sea supporting bombing missions over Afghanistan.

item.title: 664: The Room of Requirement
item.description: Stories of people who roam the stacks and find unexpected things that just happen to be exactly what they required.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Stories of people who roam the stacks and find unexpected things that just happen to be exactly what they required.
item.itunes:summary: Stories of people who roam the stacks and find unexpected things that just happen to be exactly what they required.

item.title: 550: Three Miles
item.description: What happens when of a group of public school students in the Bronx goes to visit an elite private school three miles away.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: What happens when of a group of public school students in the Bronx goes to visit an elite private school three miles away.
item.itunes:summary: What happens when of a group of public school students in the Bronx goes to visit an elite private school three miles away.

item.title: 218: Act V
item.description: A group of inmates at a high-security prison stage a production of the last act of Hamlet.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: A group of inmates at a high-security prison stage a production of the last act of Hamlet.
item.itunes:summary: A group of inmates at a high-security prison stage a production of the last act of Hamlet.

item.title: 266: I'm From the Private Sector and I'm Here to Help
item.description: Nancy Updike goes to Iraq to try to figure out what it's like to be a private citizen working in the middle of a war zone.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Nancy Updike goes to Iraq to try to figure out what it's like to be a private citizen working in the middle of a war zone.
item.itunes:summary: Nancy Updike goes to Iraq to try to figure out what it's like to be a private citizen working in the middle of a war zone.

item.title: 360: Switched at Birth
item.description: Two baby girls born in a small-town hospital are accidentally switched, and go home with the wrong families.
item.itunes:author: This American Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Two baby girls born in a small-town hospital are accidentally switched, and go home with the wrong families.
item.itunes:summary: Two baby girls born in a small-town hospital are accidentally switched, and go home with the wrong families.
